abstract: The three-year agreements with the Communications Workers of America provide for wage increases, but full details were not released.
snippet: The three-year agreements with the Communications Workers of America provide for wage increases, but full details were not released.
lead_paragraph: AT&T announced this weekend that it had reached tentative three-year contracts with a union representing more than 13,000 workers in its Midwest division and an additional 5,700 workers at a unit specializing in major corporate accounts.

headline.main: Two Units of AT&T Reach Pacts With Union
headline.print_headline: Two Units Of AT&T Reach Pacts With Union
